data.message: Facebook is a wonderful way to see how my family members are doing , I enjoy the family and friend connection but I don't have much use for all the political posts . I have had to unfriend several friends who only want to bash everything that the Gov't does , it would be nice if you set up a feed for politics only so family friendly feeds can enjoy facebook without all the negative political agendas .i am not a here to see all the politics. I am here to promote friendship and family !

replies.message: Hi Randy. We appreciate your feedback and are glad you enjoy Facebook! - Sarah
